channel.title: 667 shop logout help
channel.description:
So the problem is when im in the shop in game all the items are in the custom shop that i added to "The Raptor" NPC so i added some armours such as vesta, statius torva goliath gloves and steadfast boots, the thing is when i click on the torva or statius it logs me out but if i click on any other item in the shop it works fine?
Help please. Yes im using the Zenithscape source and ik you might think its a bad source to use but ehh i dont mind it so.
*Edit: It allows me to right click and buy the item, it just wont open the info interface.
